title: The Cellar
description: After her parents died & her grandparents went missing, Helen Chambers, a descendant of the Burrow's family line, discovers at the age of 24, that she was born into a specially abled type of family that is able to time travel in the past, amongst possessing many other unusual gifts. As if that knowledge wasn't enough to stun the young prosecutor or anyone else for that matter, she learns that her family line isnâ€™t the only one that possesses unique gifts either. While trying to adjust to this news, she also learns that she is the only person who can ensure the return of her grandparents... that is, if she can master her gifts in time to find them.
author: Melissa Alina Strouse
